div.p: WWARN is committed to ensuring that all data contributors receive credit for their work. We ask that you include the details for any individuals and institutions that should be credited for this study. Names will appear in the order that you provide. The institutions and investigators will be included in the study details displayed in the WWARN Explorer, where you will also find a link to any publication(s) available in PubMed.
You can update this information at any time by logging into your account, navigating to this study and clicking the Acknowledgements tab.
